metadata.title: CVE-2024-52596 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: SimpleSAMLphp xml-common is a common classes for handling XML-structures.When loading an (untrusted) XML document, for example the SAMLResponse,it's possible to induce an XXE. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.19.0.

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
